# Tender Announcement: Console Freeze Dryer Acquisition

## Tender Details

* **Tender ID**: PW-22-01016275
* **Tender Title**: 22-58051 Console Freeze Dryer SA E60PV-EQUI (English) / Lyophilisateur Console Frigorifique à AM, E60PV-EQUI (French)
* **Publication Date**: December 8, 2022
* **Closing Date**: January 17, 2023 (23:00 EST)
* **Location**: National Capital Region (NCR), Prince Edward Island
* **Contracting Entity**: National Research Council Canada
* **Contact Information**:
	+ **Name**: Katie Homuth
	+ **Email**: [Katie.Homuth@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Katie.Homuth@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
	+ **Phone**: 343-549-4539

## Background

The National Research Council Canada's Aquatic, Crop Resource Development (ACRD) portfolio is seeking a Console Freeze Dryer to meet specific technical requirements.

## Tender Description

The Console Freeze Dryer must fulfill the following mandatory technical specifications:

1. 18L ice capacity
2. -50°C temperature achievement with aqueous samples
3. Bulk tray dryer with 6-port manifold
4. Temperature and vacuum level controls in 30 programs with up to 16 segments each
5. Quality reassurance with onboard data collection and real-time graphing
6. Sample probes with remote notification of operating parameters or alerts
7. Quick disconnect drain hose
8. Built-in cabinet for vacuum pump
9. Vacuum break valve (bleeds air into the system when power is shut off)
10. Moisture sensor to prevent refrigeration or vacuum start-up
11. 230V, 60Hz power supply with North America plug
12. CSA or ULC standards compliance
13. Integrated display for temperature, vacuum status, manual start/stop, and automated program storage
14. Flexible programming and control of optional drying accessories
15. Direct vacuum pump with exhaust filter and tubing connection
16. Front viewing window for monitoring vacuum pump oil
17. HEPA filter to prevent particulate contamination

## Installation

The Contractor must deliver all products to the specified location.

## Warranty and Support Services

The vendor must provide a one-year parts and labour warranty after delivery.

## Tender Evaluation Criteria

Only responders holding a valid Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services
